anya-e0802n:2390_0: Ekādito dasassa ante īpaccayo hoti vā saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe.
anya-e0802n:2394_0: Dasasadde pare niccaṃ chassa so hoti.
anya-e0802n:2400_0: Tāsaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ ante tikārāgamo hoti. Vīsati, tiṃsati.
anya-e0802n:2402_0: Dakāra rakārānaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ lakārādeso hoti. Soḷasa, cattālīsaṃ.
anya-e0802n:2406_0: Tuggahaṇena dvissa du di do ādesā ca honti. Durattaṃ, dirattaṃ, diguṇaṃ, dohaḷinī.
anya-e0802n:2408_0: Ekādito dasassa dakārassa rakāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne.
anya-e0802n:2412_0: Aṭṭhaiccevamādito ca dasasaddassa dakārassa rakārādeso hoti vā saṅkhyāne.
anya-e0802n:2417_0: Dvi eka aṭṭhaiccetesamanto ākāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne.
anya-e0802n:2419_0: Saṅkhyāneti kimatthaṃ? Dvidanto, ekadanto, ekacchanno, aṭṭhatthambho.
anya-e0802n:2421_0: Catu chaiccetehi tha ṭhaiccete paccayā honti saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe.
anya-e0802n:2427_0: Dvi tiiccetesaṃ du taiccete ādesā honti tiyapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n:2429_0: Apiggahaṇena aññesupi dviiccetassa duādeso hoti. Durattaṃ.
anya-e0802n:2430_0: Caggahaṇena dviiccetassa dikāro hoti. Dirattaṃ, diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ pārupetvā.
anya-e0802n:2432_0: Tesaṃ catuttha dutiya tatiyānaṃ aḍḍhūpapadānaṃ aḍḍhaḍḍhudivaḍḍha diyaḍḍha aḍḍhatiyādesā honti,
anya-e0802n:2435_0: Sarūpānaṃ padabyañjanānaṃ ekaseso hoti asakiṃ. Puriso ca puriso ca purisā.
anya-e0802n:2436_0: Sarūpānamiti kimatthaṃ? Hatthī ca asso ca ratho ca pattiko ca hatthiassarathapattikā,
anya-e0802n:2438_1: Gaṇane dasassa dviticatupañcachasattaaṭṭhanavakānaṃ vī ti cattāra paññā cha sattāsanavā yosu,
anya-e0802n:2439_0: Gaṇane dasassa dvika tika catukka pañcaka chakka sattakaaṭṭhaka navakānaṃ sarūpānaṃ katekasesānaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0802n:2439_1: vī ti cattāra paññā cha satta asa navaiccādesā honti asakiṃ yosu,
anya-e0802n:2439_2: yonañca īsaṃ āsaṃ ṭhi ri ti īti utiiccādesā honti.
anya-e0802n:2440_0: Vīsaṃ, tiṃsaṃ, cattālīsaṃ, paññāsaṃ, saṭṭhi, sattari, sattati, asīti, navuti.
anya-e0802n:2444_0: Catūpapadassa gaṇane pariyāpannassa tukārassa lopo hoti,
anya-e0802n:2450_0: Dviiccevamādito kapaccayo hoti anekatthe ca, nipātanā sijjhanti.
anya-e0802n:2452_0: 393, 415. Dasadasakaṃ sataṃ dasakānaṃ sataṃ sahassañca yomhi.
anya-e0802n:2453_0: Gaṇane pariyāpannassa dasadasakassa sataṃ hoti, satadasakassa sahassaṃ hoti yomhi pare.
anya-e0802n:2457_0: Yāva tāsaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ uttari dasaguṇitañca kātabbaṃ.

anya-e0802n:2461_0: Yāsaṃ pana saṅkhyānaṃ aniddiṭṭhanāmadheyyānaṃ sakehi sakehi nāmehi nippajjante.
anya-e0802n:2465_0: Gotamassa apaccaṃ gotamo. Evaṃ vāsiṭṭho. Venateyyo, ālasyaṃ, ārogyaṃ.
anya-e0802n:2468_0: Ekena vibhāgena ekadhā. Evaṃ dvidhā, tidhā, catudhā, pañcadhā, chadhā.
anya-e0802n:2469_0: Ceti kimatthaṃ? Sopaccayo hoti. Suttaso, byañjanaso, padaso.
anya-e0802n:2478_0: Ādisarassa vā asaṃyogantassa ādibyañjanassa vā sarassa vuddhi hoti saṇakārake paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n:2482_0: Iuiccetesaṃ ādibhūtānaṃ mā vuddhi hoti. Tesu ca e o vuddhāgamo hoti ṭhāne.
anya-e0802n:2485_0: Iuiccetesaṃ āttañca hoti, rikārāgamo ca ṭhāne.
anya-e0802n:2487_0: Yūnamiti kimatthaṃ? Apāyesu jāto āpāyi ko.
anya-e0802n:2488_0: Ṭhāneti kimatthaṃ? Vematiko, opanayiko, opamāyiko, opāyiko.
anya-e0802n:2490_0: Kvaci ādimajjhauttaraiccetesaṃ dīgharassā honti paccayesu ca apaccayesu ca.
anya-e0802n:2491_0: Ādidīgho tāva – pākāro, nīvāro, pāsādo, pākaṭo, pātimokkho, pāṭikaṅkho iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:2493_0: Uttaradīgho tāva – khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā, añjanā giri, koṭarā vanaṃ, aṅgulī iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:2499_0: Tesu ādimajjhuttaresu yathājinavacanānuparodhena kvaci vuddhi hoti,
anya-e0802n:2501_0: Majjhevuddhi tāva – sukhaseyyaṃ, sukhakāri dānaṃ, sukhakāri sīlaṃ iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:2502_0: Uttaravuddhi tāva – kāliṅgo, māgadhiko, paccakkhadhammā iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:2504_0: Majjhelopo tāva – kattukāmo, kumbhakāraputto, vedallaṃ iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:2509_0: Ādivikāro tāva – ārisyaṃ, āṇyaṃ, āsabhaṃ, ajjavaṃ iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:2511_0: Uttaravikāro tāva – yāni, tāni, sukhāni iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:2512_0: Ādiviparīto tāva – uggate sūriye uggacchati iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:2513_0: Majjheviparīto tāva – samuggacchati, samuggate sūriye iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:2519_3: tesaṃ akāraivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ ā e ovuddhiyo honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ,
anya-e0802n:2522_0: Vuddhiiccanena kvattho? Vuddhādisarassa vā’saṃyogantassa saṇe ca.
anya-e0802n:2541_0: Atha sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni parassapadasaññāni honti.
anya-e0802n:2542_0: Taṃ yathā? Ti anti, si tha, mi ma.
anya-e0802n:2545_0: Sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni. Tāni tāni attanopadasaññāni honti.
anya-e0802n:2546_0: Taṃ yathā? Te ante, se vhe, e mhe.
anya-e0802n:2547_0: Attanopadamiccanena kvattho? Attanopadāni bhāve ca kammani.
anya-e0802n:2549_1: attanopadānañca dve dve padāni paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisasaññāni honti.
anya-e0802n:2553_0: Sabbesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ paṭhamamajjhimuttama purisānaṃ ekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0802n:2554_6: Evaṃ sesāsu vibhattīsu paro puriso yojetabbo.
anya-e0802n:2556_0: Nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe paṭhamapuriso hoti.
anya-e0802n:2559_0: Tulyādhikaraṇeti kimatthaṃ? Tena haññase tvaṃ devadattena.
anya-e0802n:2561_0: Tumhe payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe majjhimapuriso hoti.
anya-e0802n:2566_0: Amhe payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe uttamapuriso hoti.
anya-e0802n:2576_0: Āṇatyatthe ca āsīsatthe ca anuttakāle pañcamī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n:2579_0: Anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle sattamī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n:2585_0: Hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā apaccakkhe vā hiyyattanī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n:2586_0: So agamā maggaṃ, te agamū maggaṃ.
anya-e0802n:2588_0: Ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā apaccakkhe vā samīpe ajjatanīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n:2589_0: So maggaṃ agamī, te maggaṃ agamuṃ.
anya-e0802n:2591_0: Hiyyattanīajjatanīiccetā vibhattiyo yadā māyogā, tadā sabbakāle ca honti.
anya-e0802n:2592_0: Mā gamā, mā vacā, mā gamī, mā vacī.
anya-e0802n:2596_0: So gacchissati, karissati. Te gacchissanti, karissanti.
anya-e0802n:2598_0: Kriyātipannamatte atīte kāle kālātipatti vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n:2599_0: So ce taṃ yānaṃ alabhissā, agacchissā. Te ce taṃ yānaṃ alabhissaṃsu, agacchissaṃsu.
anya-e0802n:2600_0: 423, 426. Vattamānā ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe.

anya-e0802n:2603_0: 424, 450. Pañcamī tu antu, hitha, mima, taṃ antaṃ, ssu vho, e āmase.
anya-e0802n:2604_0: Pañcamīiccesā saññā hoti tu antu, hi tha, mima,
anya-e0802n:2607_0: Sattamī iccesā saññā hoti eyya eyyuṃ,
anya-e0802n:2609_0: 426, 459. Parokkhā au ettha, aṃmha, tthare, ttho vho, iṃ mhe.
anya-e0802n:2610_0: Parokkhā iccesā saññā hoti a u, ettha, aṃ mha,
anya-e0802n:2612_0: 427, 455. Hiyyattanī āū, ottha, aṃmhā, tthatthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ mhase.
anya-e0802n:2613_0: Hiyyattanī iccesā saññā hoti ā ū, o ttha, aṃ mhā,
anya-e0802n:2614_0: Hiyyattanī iccanena kvattho? Hiyyopabhuti paccakkhe hiyyattanī.
anya-e0802n:2615_0: 428, 468. Ajjatanī ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, aṃ mhe.
anya-e0802n:2616_0: Ajjatanī iccesā saññā hoti ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃmhā, ā ū, sevhaṃ, aṃ mhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
anya-e0802n:2619_0: Bhavissantī iccesā saññā hoti ssati ssanti,
anya-e0802n:2622_0: Kālātipatti iccesā saññā hoti ssā ssaṃsu,
anya-e0802n:2623_0: Kālātipatti iccanena kvattho? Kriyātipanne’ tīte kālātipatti.
anya-e0802n:2625_0: Hiyyattanādayo catasso vibhattiyo sabbadhātuka saññā honti.
anya-e0802n:2633_0: 433, 528. Tija gupa kita māne hi kha cha sā vā.
anya-e0802n:2634_0: Tija gupa kita mānu iccetehi dhātūhi kha cha sa iccete paccayā honti vā.

anya-e0802n:2638_0: Bhuja ghasa hara su pāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tumicchatthesu kha cha saiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0802n:2646_0: Nāmato upamānā ācāratthe ca īyapaccayo hoti.

anya-e0802n:2649_0: Ācāreti kimatthaṃ? Achattaṃ chattamiva rakkhati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n:2652_0: Attano pattamicchati = pattīyati. Evaṃ vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, dhanīyati, ghaṭīyati.
anya-e0802n:2653_0: Atticchattheti kimatthaṃ? Aññassa pattamicchati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n:2654_0: 438, 540. Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
anya-e0802n:2655_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi ṇeṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayaiccete paccayā honti kāritasaññā ca hetvatthe.
anya-e0802n:2656_2: atha vā karontaṃ payojayati = kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti,
anya-e0802n:2656_5: te aññe “karotha karotha” iccevaṃ bruvanti = kārenti,
anya-e0802n:2656_11: atha vā pacantaṃ payojayati = pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti,
anya-e0802n:2656_14: te aññe “pacatha pacatha” iccevaṃ bruvanti = pācenti,
anya-e0802n:2660_0: Tasmā nāmasmā ṇayapaccayo hoti kāritasañño ca dhāturūpe sati.
anya-e0802n:2662_0: Caggahaṇena āra ālaiccete paccayā honti. Santaṃ karoti = santārati, upakkamaṃ karoti = upakkamālati.

anya-e0802n:2668_0: Tassa yapaccayassa cavaggayakāravakārattaṃ hoti dhātūnaṃ antena saha yathāsambhavaṃ.

anya-e0802n:2669_2: kujjhante, ujjhate, ujjhante. Haññate, haññante. Kayyate, kayyante. Dibbate, dibbante.
anya-e0802n:2671_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi yamhi paccaye, pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n:2676_0: Vuḍḍhate, phallate, dammate, sakkate, labbhate, dissate.

anya-e0802n:2693_0: Abhisuṇoti, abhisuṇāti, saṃvuṇoti, saṃvuṇāti, āvuṇoti, āvuṇāti, pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0802n:2696_0: Kiṇāti, jināti, dhunāti, munāti, lunāti, punāti.

anya-e0802n:2701_0: Tanuiccevamādito dhātugaṇato o yiraiccete paccayā honti kattari.
anya-e0802n:2702_0: Tanoti, tanohi, karoti, karohi, kayi rati, kayirāhi.
anya-e0802n:2704_0: Curaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇe ṇayaiccete paccayā honti kattari, kāritasaññā ca.
anya-e0802n:2705_0: Coreti, corayati, cinteti, cintayati, manteti, mantayati.
anya-e0802n:2707_0: Bhāve ca kammani ca attanopadāni honti.
anya-e0802n:2708_0: Uccate, uccante, majjate, majjante, yujjate, yujjante, kujjhate,
anya-e0802n:2714_0: Titikkhati, jigucchati, vīmaṃsati, samuddāyati, puttīyati, kāreti, pāceti.
anya-e0802n:2719_0: Bhūiccevamādayo ye saddagaṇā, te dhātusaññā honti.
anya-e0802n:2720_0: Bhavati, bhavanti, carati, caranti, pacati, pacanti,
anya-e0802n:2724_0: Ādibhūtānaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ ekassarānaṃ kvaci dvebhāvo hoti.
anya-e0802n:2728_0: Dvebhūtassa dhātussa yo pubbo, so abbhāsasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n:2731_0: Abbhāse vattamānassa sarassa rasso hoti. Dadhāti, jahāti.
anya-e0802n:2736_0: Abbhāse vattamānassa kavaggassa ca vaggo hoti.
anya-e0802n:2737_0: Cikicchati, jigucchati, jighacchati, jigīsati, jaṅgamati, caṅkamati.
anya-e0802n:2739_0: Mānakitaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ abbhāsagatānaṃ vakāra takārattaṃ hoti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n:2746_0: Abbhāsassa antassa ivaṇṇo hoti, akāro vā.
anya-e0802n:2747_0: Jigucchati, pivāsati, vīmaṃsati, jighacchati, babhūva, dadhāti.
anya-e0802n:2754_0: Tato abbhāsato pāmānaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ vāmaṃiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n:2765_0: Ñāiccetassa dhātussa jā jaṃ nāādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n:2768_0: Disaiccetassa dhātussa passa dissa dakkhaiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n:2772_0: Byañjanantassa dhātussa co hoti chapaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0802n:2775_0: Byañjanantassa dhātussa ko hoti khapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n:2778_0: Haraiccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva gīādeso hoti sapaccaye pare.

anya-e0802n:2785_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa anto makāro ccho hoti vā sabbāsu paccayavibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n:2786_2: Gaccheyya. Gameyya. Agacchā, agamā. Agacchī, agamī.
anya-e0802n:2789_0: Vacaiccetassa dhātussa akāro ottamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n:2795_0: Mikāraggahaṇena hivibhattimhi akāro kvaci na dīghamāpajjate. Gacchahi.
anya-e0802n:2798_0: Gaccha, gacchāhi, gama, gamāhi, gamaya, gamayāhi.

anya-e0802n:2817_0: Kāreti, kārenti, kārayati, kārayanti, kārāpeti, kārāpenti, kārāpayati, kārāpayanti.

anya-e0802n:2821_6: ghaṭāpayati, gāmeti, gameti, gāmayati, gamayati, gāmāpeti, gamāpeti.
anya-e0802n:2824_0: Aññesu ca paccayesu sabbesaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0802n:2828_0: Guha dusaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite.
anya-e0802n:2831_0: Vaca vasa vahaiccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vakārassa ukāro hoti yapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n:2834_0: Hakārassa vipariyayo hoti yapaccaye pare, yapaccayassa ca lo hoti vā.

anya-e0802n:2840_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa hakārassa lopo hoti ṇhāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n:2843_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa kāsattaṃ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n:2845_0: Kāsattamitibhāvaniddesena aññatthāpi sāgamo hoti. Ahosi, adāsi.
anya-e0802n:2847_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā mimaiccetesaṃ vibhattīnaṃ mhimhādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n:2850_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā thassa vibhattissa tthattaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n:2853_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā tissa vibhattissa tthittaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n:2856_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā tussa vibhattissa tthuttaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n:2859_0: Asasseva dhātussa simhi vibhattimhi antassa lopo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n:2862_0: Labhaiccetāya dhātuyā ī iṃnaṃ vibhattīnaṃ ttha tthaṃādesā honti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n:2865_0: Kusaiccetāya dhātuyā īvibhattissa cchihoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n:2868_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa dajjādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n:2871_0: Vadaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa vajjādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n:2874_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghammādeso hoti vā.

anya-e0802n:2902_0: Ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa nāpaccayassa lopo hoti vā, yakārattañca.
anya-e0802n:2917_0: Okārassa dhātvantassa sare pare avādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n:2921_0: Ekārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ayādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n:2924_0: Te o eiccete āva āyādese pāpuṇanti kārite.
anya-e0802n:2926_0: Yogavibhāgena aññasmimpi ekārassa āyādeso hoti. Gāyati, gāyanti.

anya-e0802n:2932_0: Idha ākhyāte aniddiṭṭhesu sādhanesu kvaci dhātuvibhattipaccayānaṃ dīghaviparītādesalopāgamaiccetāni kāriyāni jinavacanānurūpāni kātabbāni.
anya-e0802n:2933_0: Jāyati, kareyya, jāniyā, siyā, kare, gacche, jaññā,

anya-e0802n:2943_0: Brūiccetāya dhātuyā īkārāgamo hoti timhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n:2946_0: Dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti anekasarassa.
anya-e0802n:2951_0: Isu yamu iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto ccho hoti vā. Icchati, niyacchati.
anya-e0802n:2964_0: Vanditvā pubbamahaṃ, vakkhāmi sasādhanaṃ hi kitakappaṃ.

anya-e0802n:3354_0: Ala kala salaiccetehi dhātūhi la yapaccayā honti.
anya-e0802n:3357_0: Tehi kala salaiccetehi dhātūhi yāṇa lāṇapaccayā honti.
anya-e0802n:3360_0: Mathaiccetassa dhātussa thassa lādesohoti. Aññamaññaṃ mathati viloḷatīti mallo, mallaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3361_0: Caggahaṇena lato ko ca āgamo hoti. Mallako, mallakaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3366_0: Avassaka adhamiṇaiccetesvatthesu ṇīpaccayo hoti, kiccā ca.
anya-e0802n:3367_0: Avassate tāva – kārīsi me kammaṃ avassaṃ hārīsi me bhāraṃ avassaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3368_0: Adhamiṇe – dāyīsi me sataṃ iṇaṃ, dhārīsi me sahassaṃ iṇaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3371_0: Araha sakka bhabbaiccevamādīhi payoge sati sabbadhātūhi tuṃpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n:3374_0: Vajaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, upasaggapaccayādīhi ca pabbajjādayo saddā nippajjante.
anya-e0802n:3378_15: pari samantato tanoti vitthāretīti parito iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:3380_0: Saca jānaṃ dhātūnamantānaṃ cajānaṃ kagādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṇānubandhe paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n:3381_0: Oko, pāko, seko, soko, viveko, cāgo, yogo, bhogo, rogo, rāgo, bhāgo, bhaṅgo, raṅgo, saṅgo.
anya-e0802n:3383_0: Nuda sūda jana su lū hu pu bhū ñā a sa samuiccevamādīhi dhātūhi,
anya-e0802n:3383_1: phanda citi āṇa iccevamādīhi sakāritehi ca yuṇvūnaṃ paccayānaṃ ana ānana aka ānanakādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kattari,
anya-e0802n:3384_2: Evaṃ sūdano, janano, savaṇo, lavano, havano, pavano, bhavano, ñāṇo, asano, samaṇo.
anya-e0802n:3385_2: Evaṃ sūdanaṃ, jananaṃ, savaṇaṃ, lavanaṃ, havanaṃ, pavanaṃ, bhavanaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, asanaṃ, samaṇaṃ,
anya-e0802n:3386_0: Kārite ca – phandāpīyate phandāpanaṃ, cetāpīyate cetāpanaṃ, āṇāpīyate āṇāpanaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3387_2: evaṃ sūdanaṃ, jananaṃ, savaṇaṃ, lavaṇaṃ, havanaṃ, pavanaṃ, bhaganaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, asanaṃ, savaṇaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3389_0: Kārite tu – phandāpayatīti phandāpayako. Evaṃ āṇāpayako, cetāpayako, sañjānanako.
anya-e0802n:3390_0: 642, 588. I ya ta ma ki e sāna’mantassaro dīghaṃ kvaci du sa ssa guṇaṃ do raṃ sakkhī ca.
anya-e0802n:3391_0: Iya ta ma ki e saiccetesaṃ sabbanāmānamanto saro dīghamāpajjate,
anya-e0802n:3391_3: dhātvantassa sassa ca sa kkha īiccete ādesā honti yathāsambhavaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3391_4: Ete saddā sakena sakena nāmena yathānuparodhena buddhasāsane pacchā puna nippajjante.
anya-e0802n:3392_17: evaṃ mādikkho, kīdikkho, edikkho, sādikkho. Īdī, yādī, tādī, mādī, kīdī, edī, sādī.
anya-e0802n:3393_0: Caggahaṇena tesameva saddānaṃ iyaiccevamādīnamanto ca saro kvaci dīghatthamāhu. Īdikkho, yādikkho, tādikkho, mādikkho, kīdikkho, edikkho, sādikkho. Idiso, sadiso, sariso, sarikkho.
anya-e0802n:3394_0: 643, 635. Bhyādīhi mati budhi pūjādīhi ca tto.
anya-e0802n:3395_0: Bhīiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, mati. Budhi pūjādito ca tta paccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n:3397_0: 644, 661. Vepu sī dava vamu ku dā bhū hvādīhi thu ttima ṇimā nibbatte.
anya-e0802n:3398_0: Vepu sī dava vamu ku dā bhū huiccevamādīhi dhātūhi yathāsambhavaṃ thu ttima ṇimapaccayā honti nibbattatthe.
anya-e0802n:3401_0: Akkosaiccetasmiṃ atthe namhi paṭisedhayutte ānipaccayo hoti dhātūhi.
anya-e0802n:3402_0: Na gamitabbaṃ agamāni te jamma desaṃ, na kattabbaṃ akarāṇi te jamma kammaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3403_0: Namhīti kimatthaṃ? Vipatti te jamma, vikati te jamma.
anya-e0802n:3404_0: Akkoseti kimatthaṃ? Na gantabbā agati te.
anya-e0802n:3409_0: Sunaiccetassa pāṭipadikassa unassa oṇa vāna uvāna ūna unakha una ā ānādesā honti.
anya-e0802n:3410_2: evaṃ suvāno, sūno, sunakho, suno, sā, sāno.
anya-e0802n:3415_0: Yuvaiccetassa pāṭipadikassa uvassa uvauvāna unaūnādesā honti.
anya-e0802n:3418_0: Kāle vattamānatthe ca atītatthe ca ṇu yu tapaccayā honti.
anya-e0802n:3419_0: Akāsi, karotīti kāru, agacchi, gacchatīti, vāyu, abhavi, bhavatīti bhūtaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3421_0: Bhavissatikālatthe gamu bhaja su ṭhāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi ṇī ghiṇa paccayā honti.
anya-e0802n:3424_0: Kriyāyamatthe ṇvu tuiccete paccayā honti bhavissatikāle.
anya-e0802n:3433_0: Sesaiccetasmiṃ atthe ssaṃ ntu māna āna iccete paccayā honti bhavissatikāle kammūpapade.
anya-e0802n:3436_0: Cha da ci ti su nī vi da pada tanu yata ada mada yuja vatumida mā pu ka la vara ve pu gupa dā iccevamādīhi
anya-e0802n:3436_1: dhātūhi tatraṇa iccete paccayā honti yathāsambhavaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3437_2: Cintenti sampayuttadhammā ethenāti vā cittaṃ, citraṃ.
anya-e0802n:3437_6: Satte icchitaṭṭhānaṃ nenti etenāti vā nettaṃ, netraṃ.
anya-e0802n:3437_12: Āhārā patanti ettha bhājaneti pattaṃ, patraṃ.
anya-e0802n:3437_17: Yatati vīriyaṃ karoti etenāti vā yattaṃ, yatraṃ.
anya-e0802n:3437_25: Pari samanta to sabbākārena minanti etāyāti mattā, matrā.
anya-e0802n:3437_27: Attano kulaṃ punāti sodhetīti putto, putro.
anya-e0802n:3437_31: Gopitabbaṃ rakkhitabbanti guttaṃ. Gutraṃ, gottaṃ, gotraṃ.
anya-e0802n:3439_0: Vada cara varaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi ṇittapaccayo hoti gaṇatthe.
anya-e0802n:3440_0: Vāditānaṃ gaṇo vādittaṃ. Evaṃ cārittaṃ, vārittaṃ, iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:3442_0: Mida pada ranja tanu dhāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tti ti iccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0802n:3443_4: attano kulaṃ tanoti vitthāretīti vā tanti,
anya-e0802n:3443_7: attano sabhāvaṃ dhāretīti vā dhāti iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:3444_0: 659, 669. Usu ranja daṃsānaṃ daṃsassa daḍḍhoḍha ṭhā ca.
anya-e0802n:3445_0: Usu ranja daṃsaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ daṃsassa daḍḍhādeso hoti, ḍha ṭhapaccayā ca honti.
anya-e0802n:3446_0: Usīyate uḍḍho, ranjanti etthāti raṭṭhaṃ, daṃsīyateti daḍḍho.
anya-e0802n:3448_0: Sūvu asaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ ūuasānaṃ atādeso hoti, thapaccayo ca.
anya-e0802n:3450_0: 661, 671. Ranjudādīhi dha didda kirā kvaci jadalopoca.
anya-e0802n:3451_0: Ranja uda idi cadi madi khuda chidi rudi dala susa suca vaca vaja iccevamādīhi dhātūhi dha da idda ka iraiccete paccayā honti,
anya-e0802n:3452_2: attani sannissitānaṃ macchamakarānaṃ pītisomanassaṃ undati pasavati janetīti samuddo,
anya-e0802n:3452_15: appaṭihato hutvā vajati gacchatīti vajiraṃ iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n:3454_0: Paṭiiccetasmā hissa dhātussa heraṇa hīraṇa ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n:3457_0: Kaḍi ghaḍi vaḍi karaḍi maḍi saḍi kuṭhi bhaḍi paḍi daḍi raḍi taḍi isiḍi caḍi gaḍi aḍi laḍi meḍi eraḍi
anya-e0802n:3457_1: khaḍi iccevamādīhi dhātūhi kapaccayo hoti saha paccayena ca nippajjante yathāsambhavaṃ.
anya-e0802n:3458_11: visesena taṇḍati cāleti paresaṃ viññūnaṃ hadayaṃ kampetīti vitaṇḍo,
anya-e0802n:3458_14: gaṇḍati sannicayati samūhaṃ karoti etthāti gaṇḍo,
anya-e0802n:3460_0: Khāda ama gamuiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ khandha andha gandhādesā honti, kapaccayo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n:3461_3: taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ vātena gacchatīti gandho.
anya-e0802n:3463_0: Paṭa kala kusa kada bhaganda mekha vakka takka palla sadda mūla bila vida caḍaṃ pañca vā vasa paci maca
anya-e0802n:3463_1: musa gotthu puthu bahu maṅga baha kamba samba aggaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi pāṭi padikehi ca uttarapadesu
anya-e0802n:3464_2: pāpake akusale dhamme kusati chindatīti kusalaṃ,
anya-e0802n:3464_4: kuse uddissa dāne alanti vā kusalaṃ,
anya-e0802n:3464_5: kuse sañcaye dhammasamudāye alanti vā kusalaṃ,
anya-e0802n:3466_0: Puthaiccetassa pāṭipadikassa puthu pathādesā honti, kvaci amapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n:3467_0: Putha hutvā jātanti puthavī pathame jāto pathamo, pathavī,
anya-e0802n:3469_0: Sasu dada ada madaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tu duiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0802n:3470_3: dukkhaṃ adati anubhavati jano etenāti vā addu,
anya-e0802n:3470_4: dukkhaṃ bhājanaṃ ādhāraṃ bhāvatīti vā addu,
anya-e0802n:3473_3: Dhāreti dhāretvā jīvitaṃ kappetīti dhīvaro, dhīvaraṃ.
anya-e0802n:3475_0: Muna yata agga pata kava suca ruca mahāla bhaddāla manaiiccevamādīhi dhātūhi,
anya-e0802n:3476_4: patati seṭṭho hutvā purato gacchatīti pati,
anya-e0802n:3478_0: Vida valla masa sida dukukapu maya udi khajja kuraiccevamādīhi dhātūhi,
anya-e0802n:3479_9: attano gandhena aññaṃ gandhaṃ kapati hanati hiṃsatīti kappūro,
anya-e0802n:3481_0: Hana jana bhāri khanu ama ve vedhā siki hi iccevamādīhi dhātūhi nu ṇu kuiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0802n:3482_0: Bhojanaṃ hanati hiṃsati etenāti haṇu, hanu vā.
anya-e0802n:3482_5: Aṅgamaṅgassa rujjanabhāvaṃ vijjhanabhāvaṃ amati gacchatīti aṇu, veṇu,
anya-e0802n:3484_0: Kuṭa kusa kaṭaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ṭhapaccayo hotī.
anya-e0802n:3487_0: Manu pūra suṇa kusu ila ala maha si ki iccevamādīhi dhātūhi,
anya-e0802n:3487_1: pāṭipadikehi ca usa nusa isaiccete paccayā honti,
anya-e0802n:3488_0: Kusalākusale dhamme manati jānātīti manusso, mānuso.
anya-e0802n:3488_1: Kāraṇā kāraṇaṃ manati jānātīti vā manusso, mānusso.
anya-e0802n:3488_2: Atthānatthaṃ manati jānātīti vā manusso, mānusso.
anya-e0802n:3488_7: dvinnaṃ jānānaṃ kulasantānaṃ karotīti vā suṇisā,
anya-e0802n:3488_10: tamandhakāravidhamanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ surati hiṃsatīti sūriyo,
anya-e0802n:3488_13: taṇhāya dubbalo hutvā ilati kampatīti vā illigho,
